source.name: The National Atlas
source.description: Integrated and documented small-scale geospatial and geostatistical data from more than two dozen Federal organizations and the Library of Congress. The National Atlas is intended for the use of America's citizens and its data offerings are supplemented with multimedia articles and many types of maps.
